title: Save up to $70 on the TicWatch Atlas with this Offer!
description: Get Mobvoi's latest Wear OS watch at a considerably lower price. The post Save up to $70 on the TicWatch Atlas with this Offer! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get Mobvoi's latest Wear OS watch at a considerably lower price.
text: Mobvoi’s line of TicWatch smart wearables have always excelled when it came to basics like battery life and everyday usability. That being said, Mobvoi’s latest TicWatch Atlas is 20% cheaper at the moment with this Black Friday Deal, bringing its price down to less than 300 bucks. READ: TicWatch Atlas Review: Ruggedly Smart In terms of specs, the TicWatch Atlas features a rugged design with 5ATM water resistance and MIL-STD-810H certification, a 1.43-inch OLED display with Sapphire Crystal protection for added durability, Qualcomm’s Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 processor, as well as other features such as 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, Bluetooth 5.2 and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, and a 628 mAh battery that can outlast most other smartwatches on the market. You can check out the deal with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
Mobvoi’s line of TicWatch smart wearables have always excelled when it came to basics like battery life and everyday usability. That being said, Mobvoi’s latest TicWatch Atlas is 20% cheaper at the moment with this Black Friday Deal, bringing its price down to less than 300 bucks.

READ: TicWatch Atlas Review: Ruggedly Smart

In terms of specs, the TicWatch Atlas features a rugged design with 5ATM water resistance and MIL-STD-810H certification, a 1.43-inch OLED display with Sapphire Crystal protection for added durability, Qualcomm’s Snapdragon W5+ Gen 1 processor, as well as other features such as 2GB RAM and 32GB storage, Bluetooth 5.2 and 2.4GHz Wi-Fi, and a 628 mAh battery that can outlast most other smartwatches on the market.
